flawed_nl_solution:
If Oprah wants to have 500 cars left, she will have to give away 3500-500 = <<3500-500=300>>300 cars.
Since the average number of cars she gives away per year is 50, it will take her 300/50 = <<300/50=6>>6 years to give away enough cars to have 500 left over.
#### 6

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3000, not 300. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
